entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

Application Description

The Secret Elevator Remastered â€” an atmospheric adventure with first-person horror elements. Take on the role of a person trapped inside their dream. This place is filled with a mix of memories and nightmares. To get out, you have to open a small door. Immerse yourself in the game's history, walk through many endings, and discover the key secret.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: AeroPads - Pads & Soundscapes
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º249,99 â†’ â‚º129,99 [â‚º129,99 ~ â‚º249,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º129,99

In-App Purchases

  • Orbit Packï¼šâ‚º229,99

Application Description

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

entry.title: Deco: Wallpaper Creator
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º129,99 â†’ â‚º39,99 [â‚º39,99 ~ â‚º129,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º39,99

Application Description

Deco: Wallpaper Your Way. Stop searching, start creating. Download Deco and design the wallpaper only you can imagine. Tired of boring backgrounds? Unleash your creativity with Deco and design stunning, unique wallpapers for your iPhone Lock Screen and Home Screen! Go way beyond the defaults and make your device truly yours. Create Your Vibe: Photos: Bring your memories to life! Use your own photos as backgrounds â€“ Deco can even intelligently separate the subject* so your stickers tuck neatly behind (or in front of) it. Gradients: Blend gorgeous, smooth color transitions with an easy-to-use editor and inspiring presets. Perfect for subtle or vibrant looks. Stripes: Design chic and custom stripe patterns. You control the colors, angle, spacing, and background for endless possibilities. Presets help you get started fast. Color: Sometimes simple is best. Pick the exact solid color that matches your mood or theme. Image Playground: Feeling adventurous? Generate completely unique scenes using the magic of AI directly within Deco*. Add Your Personal Touch: Stickers: Layer on the fun! Add text, your favorite emoji, unique stickers (including Genmoji*). Place them anywhere you like â€“ they'll look great even on different screen sizes! Simple, Powerful, Yours: Deco makes advanced customization easy and fun for everyone. It combines powerful features with a beautiful, intuitive interface. Deco won in the Swift Student Challenge 2025. (Subject Separation, Image Playground, and Genmoji require compatible devices and iOS versions supporting these Apple Intelligence features.) (iPadOS support and optional iCloud Sync planned for future updates.) Privacy Policy: https://docs.aethers.world/deco/privacypolicy Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: Hitman Sniper
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Starter Packï¼šâ‚º229,99 â†’ â‚º129,99 [â‚º129,99 ~ â‚º229,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º39,99

In-App Purchases

  • Limited Time Offerï¼šâ‚º699,99
  • Extra Large Tokens Packï¼šâ‚º499,99
  • Extra Large Money Packï¼šâ‚º349,99
  • Promo Bundleï¼šâ‚º999,99
  • Starter Packï¼šâ‚º129,99
  • Medium Money Packï¼šâ‚º179,99

Application Description

BECOME THE ULTIMATE SILENT ASSASSIN Step into the shoes of Agent 47 in Hitman: Sniper and discover the most compelling sniper experience on mobile. TACTICAL MISSIONS IN MONTENEGRO Hone your strategic skills and orchestrate the perfect assassination. ACTION ZOMBIE CHALLENGE IN DEATH VALLEY Prepare for non-stop action in a true test of your accuracy and speed of execution. MORE THAN 150 MISSIONS AND 11 DIFFERENT CONTRACTS Improve your strategy for the perfect assassination as you uncover secrets and subterfuges. 17 UNIQUE WEAPONS Eliminate targets, collect weapon parts and complete blueprints to unlock the most powerful rifles. COMPETE AGAINST YOUR FRIENDS TO DOMINATE THE LEADERBOARD Boost your score and climb up the ranks to become the world's finest silent assassin. Hitman: Sniper is memory intensive. Devices such as iPad 2, iPad Mini, iPhone 4S and iPod Touch 5th Generation will suffer from occasional dips in performance and will not support Everyplay.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Infinity Tank Battle
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º449,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º449,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • 500 Ticketsï¼šâ‚º449,99
  • 200 Ticketsï¼šâ‚º229,99
  • 50 Ticketsï¼šâ‚º99,99
  • Golden Passï¼šâ‚º99,99

Application Description

Tank Battle is very popular TV game since 8-bit console present. From 2012, we develop "Super Tank Battle" and provide 500 maps to player. Many people play it day by day. Now we using a new game engine to offer new game "Infinity Tank Battle". Infinity Tank Battle is a brand new tank battle game. It is following various classic essential features, and add some new interesting elements. Core Game Rule: - Defence your base - Destroy all enemy tanks Key Features: - Different type of enemy - Different type of Map style - Special items - Auto Helper tank - Import Super Tank Battle 500 Legend maps Infinity Tank Battle will continue update, our target is over 1000 map. And this game is cross-platform, you can find it on mobile, PC, and Mac.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: TuneShift
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º179,99 â†’ Free [Free ~ â‚º179,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

Application Description

Revitalize your Apple Music library! TuneShift intelligently matches your cherished music from NetEase Cloud Music and QQ Music to Apple Music platform. Say goodbye to tedious manual searching. With just a few simple steps, rediscover your complete music collection on Apple Music. Our smart engine ensures you find the closest matches to your original favorites. Core Advantages: â€¢ Premium music matching engine for precise track identification â€¢ Preserve complete collection structure and playback order â€¢ Real-time progress display â€¢ Minimalist design with one-click operation Privacy Protection: We prioritize user privacy, strictly adhering to privacy protocols to ensure your account information remains secure. Why Choose TuneShift: Professional music identification technology Superior matching accuracy Swift processing efficiency User-friendly interface Let TuneShift be your professional music management tool for the perfect Apple Music experience!

entry.title: Earthquake Network
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼šâ‚º99,99 â†’ â‚º49,99 [â‚º49,99 ~ â‚º99,99]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º49,99

In-App Purchases

  • Priority 10k for 1 monthï¼šâ‚º6,49
  • Priority 100k for 1 monthï¼šâ‚º2,99
  • Priority 10k for 1 yearï¼šâ‚º79,99
  • Priority 100k for 1 yearï¼šâ‚º49,99
  • Priority 10k for lifetimeï¼šâ‚º249,99
  • Priority 100k for lifetimeï¼šâ‚º199,99
  • PRO versionï¼šâ‚º99,99
  • PRO version discountedï¼šâ‚º99,99

Application Description

Earthquake Network is the most comprehensive app on earthquakes and for most world countries it is the only earthquake early warning system for receiving real time alerts. Earthquake Network gives you: - Real time alerts if you live close to the epicentre - Alerts seconds in advances if you live far from the epicentre - Real time user reports on felt earthquakes - Free earthquake data from 21 seismic networks including U.S., Puerto Rico, India, Indonesia, Turkey, Mexico, Chile, Peru, Ecuador, Argentina, Venezuela, Dominican Republic, Colombia, Costa Rica, Nicaragua, China, New Zeland, Japan, Italy, Croatia, Spain and Greece The Earthquake Network research project (https://www.sismo.app) aims at developing a smartphone-based earthquake early warning system able to detect earthquakes in real time and to alert the population in advance. Smartphones are able to detect earthquakes thanks to the accelerometer on-board each device. When an earthquake is detected, users with the application installed are immediatly alerted. Since earthquake waves travel at around 5 km/s it is possible to alert the population not yet reached by the damaging waves of the earthquake. For the scientific details about the project please refer to the scientific paper on Frontiers at https://bit.ly/2C8B5HI Subscriptions: When an earthquake is detected in real time by smartphones near the epicenter, the server sends an alert to all users with the app. Alerting all users can take up to 10 seconds since it is not technically feasible to do so instantly. Now you can join the priority lists of the first 10,000 or 100,000 people alerted in real time. The following subscriptions are available: - Subscription 10k for 1 year - Subscription 10k for 1 month - Subscription 100k for 1 year - Subscription 100k for 1 month â€¢ Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase â€¢ Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period â€¢ Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal â€¢ Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase â€¢ Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication, where applicable Privacy: https://www.sismo.app/privacy Terms and conditions: https://www.sismo.app/terms-conditions

Application Description

Classic Maze game is a classic puzzle game, perfect for training your brain during a short break. It is designed as a very simple single player game played by sliding through fun retro mazes. Play a quick game and challenge 500 mazes to become the maze king.

entry.title: PlayNav - No ads in videos!
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Premium Featuresï¼šâ‚º449,99 â†’ â‚º39,99 [â‚º19,99 ~ â‚º449,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šFree

In-App Purchases

  • Premium Featuresï¼šâ‚º39,99

Application Description

Are you tired of interruptions caused by ads in your YouTube videos? The new YouTube PlayNav video browser will block all intrusive ads that appear while watching your videos, so you can enjoy your favorite videos smoothly and without interruptions. Plus, our app offers features youâ€™ll love: â€¢ On-Screen Playback: Watch YouTube videos while using other apps. â€¢ Audio-Only Mode: Listen to any YouTube video with your screen locked. â€¢ Auto Shutdown: Set a sleep timer. (Premium) â€¢ Loop Mode: Automatically repeat your favorite videos. (Premium) â€¢ Learning Mode: Learn languages using subtitles. (Premium) It also includes essential features such as playlists, speed adjustment (improved), related videos, AirPlay, and more to enhance your video-watching experience. Â» HOW TO USE PLAYNAV? ON-SCREEN PLAYBACK (PIP) (Premium) Watch YouTube videos while using any other app. Once activated, the player will shrink on your screen, allowing you to move or hide it with a double tap. Â» How to activate it? 1. While playing a video, tap the PIP icon in the upper-left corner (two small screen icons). 2. While a video is playing, swipe up from the bottom of your iPhone, and the player will appear on your screen. AUDIO-ONLY MODE Listen to the audio of your favorite YouTube videos with your iPhone screen locked. Use it while exercising, walking, or before bed. Combine it with the auto shutdown feature to relax while listening to your favorite videos! Â» How to activate it? 1. Enable On-Screen Playback. 2. Then, lock your iPhone, and the audio will continue playing. AUTO SHUTDOWN Bedtime? Find your favorite YouTube video or playlist, set the auto shutdown timer, and let your favorite audio accompany you as you fall asleep. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Sleep icon (moon) in the player. 2. Select the time you want for auto shutdown. 3. You can combine it with Audio-Only Mode. LOOP MODE (REPEAT VIDEO) Want your video to play on repeat? Use Loop Mode to replay your video as many times as you like. You can also combine it with Audio-Only Mode. Â» How to activate it? 1. Tap the Repeat icon. Your video will keep playing on loop until you disable it. LEARN LANGUAGES WITH SUBTITLES (LEARNING MODE) Now you can learn languages using subtitles! When you activate Learning Mode, you will see both the original subtitles and the translation in your language. You can also adjust the playback speed to better understand each word. Â» How to activate it? 1 Search for videos in the language you are learning. 2 Once your video starts playing, tap the Learning Mode button next to the video title. â€“ TRY PLAYNAV NOW! â€“ Enjoy all basic features for free and unlock Premium with a one-time purchase. Minimum requirements: â€¢ iOS 15 or higher. â€¢ 3G connection or higher. Â» Related keywords: YouTube, YouTube Music, YouTube Vanced, ad blocker, no subscription, skip YouTube ads, ad-free music, block pop-ups, adblock for YouTube, block pop-up ads, ad-free content, premium ad blocker, AdBlock Plus, remove ads, YouTube without ads. - Need help? Visit: playnav.vidiom.app or contact us at info@playnav.vidiom.app Terms of Service: playnav.vidiom.app/terms-of-service Privacy Policy: playnav.vidiom.app/privacy-policy

entry.title: The Greedy Cave
entry.summary: Coupon of the Greedy Cave: â‚º129,99 â†’ â‚º39,99
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy Caveï¼šâ‚º129,99 â†’ â‚º39,99 [â‚º39,99 ~ â‚º179,99]

All Price Information

Priceï¼šâ‚º4,99

In-App Purchases

  • Coupon of the Greedy Caveï¼šâ‚º39,99
  • Package8ï¼šâ‚º2.299,99
  • Package7ï¼šâ‚º1.299,99

Application Description

In a land far, far away there once was a vast continent called Milton. It was a land where the power of rule came by the sword and the arcane, where Men who devoted themselves to the blade or to magecraft, could become the finest warriors, wisest wizards or the greatest adventurers. In this land, there are several kingdoms divided by borders but united through history. Countless stories of alliances, upheaval, and moments of peace bedeck this tapestry, but that is a tale for another day. Our story begins in a remote kingdom to the north, Iblis, an obscure and oft-forgotten place. It is a wild and barren land, a place where its people scrape a living from the earth, mining minerals for the lords of the south. On occasion, adventurers would stop by for the night but never linger. Until one day, a fledgling adventurer lost his way and stumbled into a hole. The story might have ended then had he not come back, but return he did, with sacks of gold and glittering treasure. Like a fierce gale from the north, news of his fame and fortune fanned across the kingdoms overnight, and kings sent their bravest warriors and adventurers to clear the cavern of monsters in search of treasure. Even peasants wanting a part of this newfound wealth partook in these expeditions. In no time at all, a bustling town had sprung up in this forgotten place. People set up camps, and formed their own groups to explore the cave. Clever merchants not missing this opportunity, built taverns and shops near the cave, selling equipment and potions to eager adventurers. At first, everything seemed fine. As explorers delved into the caves, they encountered new creatures and discovered new treasures. Mysteries continued to pour forth from the cave, yet nobody knew where the source of the secrets lay. However, as the explorations continued, the balance of wealth beyond the cave began to waver, and cracks appeared among those adventurers who had previously worked arm-in-arm. The latecomers or weak, limited to wandering the upper levels of the cave, could only watch as the veteran adventurers brought treasure after treasure from the deep. They began harboring dark thoughts as they watched the veteran adventurers grow arrogant from their largesse, ordering people around, hoarding secrets from the rest. The place became a festering pool of suspicions and greed, mired in a jealous rage. It started with an adventurer disappearing in the cave. Rumors circulated he had found some legendary treasure and hoarded it for himself. Others said he had been guided to another world by some mysterious magic force in the cave. Still, the unspoken belief was that he had been murdered by a rival party and was buried somewhere beneath the caverns. Nobody knows exactly what happened, but people have continued to disappear ever since. As more people have gone missing, some adventurers have called it quits, others cling to hope, and a few continue to wait and see. Which brings us to you, an ordinary young man, coming into this extraordinary circumstance with purposes unknown to others. May you find what you seek in ... -------------------------------------------------------- In " The Greedy Cave", you are a brave adventurer tasked with exploring a mysterious cave and battling all kinds of monsters. Use your wits to defeat them, learn different skills, gain mighty equipment, challenge evil monster bosses, and decipher the mystery surrounding this cave... Game Features Â·Randomly generated cave levels provide a different game experience every time! Â·Hundreds of monsters to defeat! Â·Hundreds of equipment to collect! Â·Hundreds of quests and achievements to conquer! Â·Enchant/Reform/Level up/Gold collecting, and more abundant systems to explore! Contact us bd@avalongames.com.cn https://www.facebook.com/greedycave/
